comments:

1 Nov 2005 -- 21:11 (+0300)), the following Exception occurs when I try to 
create a Web project.

There was a change in the facet support, and Konstantin has already fixed this
in HEAD. Will close this bug when this is tagged for an I-build.

Since this just due to a compilation problem, I'll verify that's it's fixed in 
the next I build and then close this bug.
Verified by Kathy in the I20051102 build.
